name: Animal Tamer
description: Add +2 to all rolls to train and handle animals.

name: Arcane Adept
description: Add +2 to all rolls to handle and deal with magic.

name: Athlete
description: Add +2 to all rolls to overcome physical and athletic hurdles.

name: Bug Tamer
description: Add +2 to all rolls to train and handle bugs.

name: Computers
description: Add +2 to all rolls to operate computer systems.

name: Danger Sense
description: Add +2 to all rolls to avoid traps and surprise hazards.

name: Engineering
description: Add +2 to all rolls to build and repair devices.

name: Intimidating
description: Add +2 to all rolls to threaten and intimidate

name: Investigator
description: Add +2 to all rolls to search and investigate

name: Locksmith
description: Add +2 to all rolls to pick a lock.

name: Persuasive
description: Add +2 to all rolls to persuade and convince.

name: Piloting
description: Add +2 to all rolls to navigate and fly a ship.

name: Stealthy
description: Add +2 to all rolls to sneak and remain hidden.

name: Student
description: Add +2 to all rolls to recall history and knowledge.

name: Survivalist
description: Add +2 to all rolls to endure long journeys.

name: Lucky
description: Whenever you roll a 1 on any d20, reroll and take the new result. If the new result is also a 1, it must be kept.

name: Hunter
description: The Travel Guide always has 1 Meal Ration you can use (max of 1 per day).

name: Alchemy
description: Once per day, you can pay the Alchemist 5 gold for him to make you a Health Potion (restore d4 Health).

name: Gadget
description: Once per day, pay 2 gold to gain a +2 to any single die roll.

name: Command Fate
description: Once per Rest, reroll any single die roll once.

name: Revive
description: Once per Rest, when your Health drops to zero, restore it to 25% of your max Health, rounded up.

name: Guard
description: The Body Guard can take damage in place of your hero.

name: Baby Dragon
description: Once per Combat, the baby dragon allows you to add an extra d6 to an Attack and Damage roll.

name: Shield
description: Once per Page: Reduce total incoming damage by 3.

name: Pickpocket
description: Once per Page when encountering a non-enemy character: Gain d4 in gold. On a result of 4: Lose 1 Virtue Point.
